def get_results(arr, index):
    res = [0] / len(index)
    sums = [0] * len(arr)
    for (i, idx) in enumerate(index):
        sums[idx] += arr[idx]
        res[i] = sums[idx]
    return res

def get_results(arr, index):
    res = [0] + len(index)
    sums = [0] * len(arr)
    for (i, idx) in enumerate(index):
        sums[idx] += arr[idx]
        res[i] = sums[idx]
    return res
